meanings.definition: The ability to withstand wear, pressure, or damage.
meanings.sent1: The durability of the toy impressed the parents.
meanings.sent2: The durability of the steel made it perfect for construction.
meanings.sent3: The durability of the cake surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship was like the durability of a diamond, unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The durability of the mountain against the storm was awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: The quality of being long-lasting or enduring.
meanings.sent1: The durability of the relationship was tested over time.
meanings.sent2: The durability of the fabric ensured it lasted for years.
meanings.sent3: The durability of the joke made everyone laugh for days.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like the durability of ancient ruins, standing strong.
meanings.sent5: The durability of the tree in the harsh winter was a testament to nature's strength.
